Title: VirtualUI
HomeWiki:
Project Description


VirtualUI is a control toolkit for Unity3D Basic 4.5.5 and above that includes the following 3D touchscreen controls:

- Button
- Vertical/Horizontal Slider
- Color Picker
- CheckBox
- Data Repeater
- Date/Time Picker
- Pie/Line/Column Charts


Upcoming Controls:
- TextBox
- Masked Input Box
- Numeric Input Box
- Modal Dialogs
- Wizard Dialogs
- Radio Button Groups
- Forms and Validation
- JSON Automatic Loading
- US/World Geo Maps
